ResourceHeader.ResourceName: DMT_N1_1132 : ICE - Power Spectra of the VLF Electric Field (1 component)
ResourceHeader.Description: This data set contains DEMETER ICE (electric field experiment) Power Spectra of the VLF Electric Field (1 component,   frequency range  15 Hz-17.4 kHz)
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement:
The DEMETER experiments are described in the special issue of Planetary and Space Science published in April 2006. We recommend the data users to contact the PI of the corresponding experiment early in their study.

An example of acknowledgments could be:

This work is based on observations with the electric field instrument ICE embarked on the satellite DEMETER launched by CNES (Centre National d'Etudes Spatiales). The author thanks J.J. Berthelier the PI of this instrument for the use of the data, and CDPP (Centre des DonnÃ©es de la Physique des Plasmas) for the provision of these data.

Parameter.Name: VLF Power spectral density
Parameter.Description: Power Spectra of the VLF Electric Field
